alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 10:23PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Coffee, northwestern Pierce, Atkinson, northwestern Ware, Bacon, Jeff Davis and Appling Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1021 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Graham to near Alma to 8 miles southwest of Pearson. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph, nickel size hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Baxley, Hazlehurst, Alma, Pearson, Willacoochee, Broxton, Ambrose, Graham and Surrency. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce
